data.comment: The match has started at Noevir Stadium.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 2, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe attack but Dyanfrez Douglas's header doesn't find the target.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki push upfield but Yoshiro Imamura quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kobe's half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 16, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 23, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ryota Ohshima.
Miki Yamane with an assist there.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Noevir Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Daigo Nishi grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Noevir Stadium.
Great play from Hotaru Yamaguchi to set up the goal.
In the minute 33, Dyanfrez Douglas of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kobe push forward at Noevir Stadium and Dyanfrez Douglas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kawasaki defence.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 37, Hotaru Yamaguchi for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Kawasaki.
Goal! Kobe take a 2-1 lead through a well-placed header from Dyanfrez Douglas.
In the minute 42, That's a fine assist from Dankler.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kobe.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kawasaki just outside Kobe's area.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Kobe.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kobe throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Kawasaki make their first substitution with Kaoru Mitoma replacing Yasuto Wakizaka.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kobe.
Kaoru Mitoma (Kawasaki) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Kobe.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Yoshiro Imamura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 53, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Dyanfrez Douglas of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 54, Kawasaki are coming forward and Akihiro Ienaga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kobe throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 55, The away team replace Jesiel with Shintaro Kurumaya.
Hidemasa Morita is on a sub for Miki Yamane for Kawasaki.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 57, Yutaro Oda is replacing Keijiro Ogawa for the home team.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 59, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kobe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Noevir Stadium.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
Kobe's Yutaro Oda has been booked in Kobe.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Noevir Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dyanfrez Douglas.
Leandro Damiao is replacing Ao Tanaka for the away team.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 69, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thorsten Fink (Kobe) is making a second substitution, with Daiju Sasaki replacing Takuya Yasui.
Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Noriaki Fujimoto.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Yoshiro Imamura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 75, Goal! Kawasaki go level at 2-2 through Reo Hatate in Kobe.
Kaoru Mitoma instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 76, Free kick Kawasaki.
Daiju Sasaki (Kobe) gets a yellow card.
Kobe will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kawasaki.
At Noevir Stadium, Leo Osaki has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 83, Free kick Kobe.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 86, Hotaru Yamaguchi (Kobe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Very nearly a goal for Kobe as Danklerstrikes the woodwork with a header.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
The away team replace Reo Hatate with Hokuto Shimoda.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe make their fourth substitution with Ryo Hatsuse replacing Kyogo Furuhashi.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Kobe's area.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
